descripcion: Ask your local SQM agronomist for a Specialty Plant Nutrition programme in accordance with your local needs and requirements.

imagenes.span: Sections of a banana leaf: left- leaf section form a N- deficient plant. Right- leaf section from a normal plant concerning N- status.
K- deficiency in a banana leaf (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Leaf symptoms of K- deficiency in banana (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Leaf symptoms of severe K- deficiency in banana.
Banana leaf deficient in Mg (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Leaf symptoms of Mg- deficiency in banana (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Leaf symptoms of Fe- deficiency in banana (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Leaf symptoms of Mn- deficiency in banana (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Banana leaf deficient in Zn (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Banana bunch showing symptoms of Zn- deficiency (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
Bunch symptoms of B- deficiency in banana (photo courtesy CORBANA and INPOFOS).
